operations.summary: Retrieve the details of a specific Region (JSON or XML)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id for the region. Use the codes indicated above.

errorResponses.reason: Bad request.  Your request is malformed in some way.  Check your supplied parameters.
Unauthorized.  Your missing your API key, or it has been suspended.
Not found.  Your search ended up with no results.

operations.notes:
Retrieve the details of a specific Region by supplying a unique id for the region. Use the following numbers:
  • 1 - South Pacific
  • 2 - Southeast Asia
  • 3 - Northeast Asia
  • 4 - South Asia
  • 5 - Central Asia
  • 6 - Middle East and North Africa
  • 7 - East and Southern Africa
  • 8 - West and Central Africa
  • 9 - Eastern Europe and Eurasia
  • 10 - Western Europe
  • 11 - Central and South America
  • 12 - North America and Caribbean

apis.description: Retrieve the details of a specific Region.
